mapper.select: SELECT S.SCODE SCODE, S.ECODE ECODE, S.IDCODE IDCODE, S.SCATE SCATE, S.SPHONE SPHONE, S.SADDR SADDR, S.SSTATUS SSTATUS, E.ENAME ENAME, M.WNAME WNAME FROM STORAGE S, ENTERPRISE E, EMPLOYEE M WHERE S.ECODE = E.ECODE AND S.IDCODE = M.IDCODE ORDER BY SCODE
mapper.update: UPDATE STORAGE SET ECODE = #{eCode}, SCATE = #{sCate}, SPHONE = #{sPhone}, SADDR = #{sAddr}, SSTATUS = #{sStatus} WHERE SCODE = #{sCode}
mapper.select: SELECT D.SDCODE SDCODE, D.SCODE SCODE, D.ECODE ECODE, D.IDCODE IDCODE, D.MCODE MCODE, D.PCODE PCODE, D.IN_CODE IN_CODE, D.SDSTOCK SDSTOCK, D.SDCOST SDCOST, D.SDPRICE SDPRICE, D.SDDATE SDDATE, E.ENAME ENAME, M.WNAME WNAME,A.MNAME MNAME, P.PNAME PNAME FROM STORAGE_DETAIL D, STORAGE S, ENTERPRISE E, EMPLOYEE M, MATERIAL A, PRODUCT P WHERE D.SCODE = S.SCODE AND D.ECODE = E.ECODE AND D.IDCODE = M.IDCODE AND D.MCODE = A.MCODE (+) AND D.PCODE = P.PCODE (+) ORDER BY SDCODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORAGE_DETAIL VALUES (STORAGE_DETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sCode}, #{eCode}, #{idCode}, #{mCode}, #{pCode}, NULL, #{sdStock}, #{sdCost}, #{sdPrice}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE STORAGE_DETAIL SET SCODE = #{sCode}, MCODE = #{mCode}, PCODE = #{pCode}, IN_CODE = NULL, IDCODE = #{idCode}, SDSTOCK = #{sdStock}, SDCOST = #{sdCost}, SDPRICE = #{sdPrice}, SDDATE = DEFAULT WHERE SDCODE = #{sdCode}
mapper.select: SELECT PCODE , PNAME FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PCODE
